item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW eNGLAND."

FRIDAY, OCTOBER 8, at the Dedham Hilton Hotel Grand Ballroom, 25 Allied Drive, Dedham. (781)329-7900.
Exit 14, East St., off Rte. 128/95.
www.se-4u.com
Free door prizes, and dance music by award-winning DJ, 8:30-12 AM.
Free HUSTLE dance lessons 7:30-8:30.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES 35-65 y.o.
Suitable for all singles and couples.
Cost is $13 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club and The Single CEOâ€™s Club.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
